name: KERA
0:
”Alexa, ask KERA to listen live”
”Alexa, ask KERA to get the news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. e. r. a.
des: Simply say "Alexa, ask KERA to listen live" or "Alexa, ask KERA to get the news" to hear the latest programming or news briefing from KERA's award-winning news team.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
